REPORT.CHANGELOG: 02.07.2019 1.0 bajtos [MS190327-28DBC2A] Zapnout trackovani zmen na vsechny typy objektu, gitovane na devu 08.07.2021 3.0 SADILEK [LD210625-0608D0A] Technicky Upgrade - server 22.12.2021 4.0 LUZNY [JL211222-0672AEA] Pregenerovat PGa XML - REPORT, REPSELECT

DATA.DESCRIPTION: List of programmes with title of programme and series, episode number, IDEC, duration and tx date
DATA.DOCUMENTATION:
Output: List of programmes.
Dialog box: Report is printed without dialog box
Visible fields: Title Ep. Original title IDEC Duration Transmission date
Report format: Standard formatted PROVYS report
DATA.REPORT_BODY: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <TfrxReport Version="3.24" DotMatrixReport="False" EngineOptions.DoublePass="True" IniFile="\Software\Provys\FastReport3" PreviewOptions.Buttons="2047" PreviewOptions.Zoom="1" PrintOptions.Printer="Default" ReportOptions.CreateDate="38023.7536277199" ReportOptions.Description.Text="" ReportOptions.Name="Archive programmes" ReportOptions.LastChange="41453.4208422685" ReportOptions.VersionBuild="1" ReportOptions.VersionMajor="1" ReportOptions.VersionMinor="1" ReportOptions.VersionRelease="1" ScriptLanguage="PascalScript" ScriptText.Text="var myTitle, myEpisodenr, myOrigTitle, MyDate, myMasterOnPageText: String; MyMasterBandCounter, myOnPageCounter, myMasterIncrementalCounter :integer; procedure Memo13OnBeforePrint(Sender: TfrxComponent); begin if (<Line> mod 2) = 0 then Memo13.Visible := true else Memo13.Visible := false; end; procedure Memo7OnBeforePrint(Sender: TfrxComponent); begin myTitle := ''; if <fdsREPORT1."SERIES_ID"> <> 0 then begin myTitle := <fdsREPORT1."X_SERIES_TITLE">; if <fdsREPORT1."TITLE"> <> '' then myTitle := myTitle + #13#10 + ' ' +<fdsREPORT1."TITLE">; end else myTitle := <fdsREPORT1."TITLE">; end; procedure Memo8OnBeforePrint(Sender: TfrxComponent); begin if <fdsREPORT1."EPISODENR"> <> 0 then myEpisodenr := <fdsREPORT1."EPISODENR"> else myEpisodenr := ''; end; procedure Memo9OnBeforePrint(Sender: TfrxComponent); begin myOrigTitle := ''; if <fdsREPORT1."SERIES_ID"> <> 0 then begin myOrigTitle := <fdsREPORT1."X_SERIES_ORIGTITLE">; if <fdsREPORT1."ORIGTITLE"> <> '' then myOrigTitle := myOrigTitle + #13#10 + ' ' +<fdsREPORT1."ORIGTITLE">; end else myOrigTitle := <fdsREPORT1."ORIGTITLE">; end; procedure Memo12OnBeforePrint(Sender: TfrxComponent); begin MyDate := ''; if <fdsREPORT1."X_TXDAY_DATE"> <> 0 then begin MyDate := formatdatetime('dd. mm. yyyy', <fdsREPORT1."X_TXDAY_DATE">); if <fdsREPORT1."X_TXDAY_DATE"> > <Date> then Memo12.Font.Style := fsBold else if <fdsREPORT1."X_TXDAY_DATE"> = <DATE> then Memo12.Font.Style := fsItalic + fsBold else Memo12.Font.Style := 0; end; end; procedure MasterData1OnBeforePrint(Sender: TfrxComponent); begin If not Engine.FinalPass then inc(MyMasterBandCounter); //styl if (<fdsREPORT1."X_REQTYPE_RF"> = <fdsREPORT1."ID_SELF">) then begin Memo7.Font.Style := 0; Memo8.Font.Style := 0; Memo9.Font.Style := 0; Memo10.Font.Style := 0; Memo11.Font.Style := 0; end else if (<fdsREPORT1."X_REQTYPE_RF"> = <fdsREPORT1."ID_CB">) then begin Memo7.Font.Style := fsItalic; Memo8.Font.Style := fsItalic; Memo9.Font.Style := fsItalic; Memo10.Font.Style := fsItalic; Memo11.Font.Style := fsItalic; end else begin Memo7.Font.Style := fsBold; Memo8.Font.Style := fsBold; Memo9.Font.Style := fsBold; Memo10.Font.Style := fsBold; Memo11.Font.Style := fsBold; end end; begin end." DATA.BODY:
SELECT prog_id, prg_series_ep.mfw_getTitle(:PROVYSPARAM_SERIES_ID) param_series_title, x_series_title, title, x_series_origtitle, x_episodenr episodenr, origtitle, plepisodenr, BRC_Convert_EP.Mfw_Tocsm_Frame(x_duration_tc) duration, idec, x_txday_date, reqtype_rf x_reqtype_rf, a_approvedby_id, series_id, ref_reference_ep.mfw_getid_nm('REQTYPE', 'CB') ID_CB, ref_reference_ep.mfw_getid_nm('REQTYPE', 'SELF') ID_SELF FROM prg_prog_list_dw -- PRO LADENI --where x_uptitle like 'MA%'
-- ORDER BY x_series_title, title, episodenr
